mapper.select: SELECT promotionId, promotionName, endTime, goodsTypeInPromotion, promotionFund, promotionStartLine, promotionPaymentReduce, registrationCapitalLimit, monthlySaleIncomeLimit, monthlySalesLimit FROM promotion WHERE status = 1;
